item.description: Hi there! My name is Mattia and I’m a physical oceanographer. I’m a PhD student at The Johns Hopkins University, Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences. My advisor is Prof. Tom Haine. I’m primarily interested in the dynamics governing the circulation of the Subpolar North Atlantic. To address the targets of my research, I run high-resolution numerical simulations and I combine model output with available observations. I’m leading the development of OceanSpy, a Python package to facilitate ocean model data analysis and visualization.
